resources.string: No memory card. Profile photo, image, audio, video, album and Moments features are not available now.
Memory card is not available now. Profile photo, image, audio, video, album and Moments features are not available now. Please try restarting your phone to fix.
Memory card out of space. Image, audio and video functions are not available now.
WeChat Horizontal Display mode is enabled. But \"Auto-rotate screen\" setting on your device is on
Want to enable Horizontal Display mode?
Back up your address book to protect your data
Back up your mobile contact list to the server to protect your data.
Network unavailable. Please try again later.
Wrong verification code. Please enter again
You have to link your QQ ID to continue. Do you want to link it now?
Operation too frequent. Please try again later
Server unavailable. Please try again later
Address book stored in cloud server
"Your address book will be backed up to our servers in an encrypted format Visit ic.qq.com on computer to manage your online address book."
"1. Easily import address book into your new phone. 2. Back up your address book data in case of phone loss. 3. Back up your data to a secure server. 4. Transferred and stored data is encrypted."
Invalid address book password. Please try again.
Find people around you and chat!
Your location data will be stored for a short time. Manually clear your location data via the top-right corner menu inside Look Around.

Show others who are also using this feature within your area.
"You can always uninstall any features you don't use."
History data will be cleared when you disable this feature.

Enter your display name that your friends will see.

If All Day is disabled, you will only receive new message notifications within the specified period.
